title: Reclaiming The Capital
opening: This was a fierce battle like no other. But, their homeland of Altea has been liberated. All that remains is the castle... If I could regain Altea castle, where I was born... Everybody, thank you... I really must thank you all for placing your trust in me... Before Marth's face flowed shimmering tears... Even the girl, who gently wiped his tears away, couldn't prevent her own tears...

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: Kris, we've returned at long last. We're back where it all began...

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: Yeah. It's a curious feeling. It feels like yesterday that I first stepped foot here and yet it seems so far away...

intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: Yes, I remember. When you first arrived here for training, you had no experience of battle. And now...

battle.speaker: Marth
battle.line: How disgraceful... Thieves inside our fair castle? What if they've stolen the Geosphere?

battle.speaker: Jagen
battle.line: Sire, we've sighted a suspicious-looking thief making his way north. We should capture him before it's too late.

battle.speaker: Kris
battle.line: Sire, if you'd allow me the honor, I will go. Your orders, please.

battle.speaker: Marth
battle.line: How disgraceful... They let thieves inside the castle? What if they've stolen the Geosphere?

battle.speaker: Jagen
battle.line: Sire, we've sighted a suspicious-looking thief making his way north. We should capture him before it's too late.

battle.speaker: Kris
battle.line: Sire, if necessary, I shall recover it. Your orders, my lord!

battle.speaker: Marth
battle.line: Macellan! Did you come here with Dolph?

battle.speaker: Macellan
battle.line: Correct. Dolph and I are going to be your reinforcements. Archanea has nothing left for me. For the justice that I believe in, allow me to fight by your side again, Prince Marth.

battle.speaker: Soldier
battle.line: Lord Willow, permission to open the door and attack?

battle.speaker: Willow
battle.line: Wait. Don't be so hasty. Inform me as soon as any of the chests in the treasury are opened. We will sortie the moment that happens. Both the thieves and the Alteans will want their greasy hands on the loot. While they're busy trying to unload the chests, we will take that chance and attack. Heh heh... This is a battle of intellect, not brawn. Don't forget! Attack when the chests are sprung!

recruit-battle.speaker: Astram
recruit-battle.line: You foul traitors! Taste the might of my Mercurius!

recruit-talk.speaker: Astram
recruit-talk.line: So it's the traitor, Jeorge. What do you want with me?

recruit-talk.speaker: Jeorge
recruit-talk.line: Wait, Astram. General Eibel has already fallen. You won't be able to win even if you continue fighting.

recruit-talk.speaker: Astram
recruit-talk.line: You want me to surrender...? Never! Even if I am the last one standing. I am a warrior of Archanea to the end!!

recruit-talk.speaker: Jeorge
recruit-talk.line: Why are you... Who are you fighting for? Are you fighting for Emperor Hardin?

recruit-talk.speaker: Astram
recruit-talk.line: No! It's not because of that man, but because of Nyna... And for Archanea!!

recruit-talk.speaker: Jeorge
recruit-talk.line: But, did Nyna tell you to fight here? Do you really think that Nyna would hope for this kind of battle?

recruit-talk.speaker: Astram
recruit-talk.line: Well... I hadn't seen Nyna for a while. I was told that she fell ill, and that I couldn't see her. But... Since Hardin is Emperor of Archanea, I have no choice. If I don't follow his orders I will become a traitor, and I will be betraying Nyna.

recruit-talk.speaker: Jeorge
recruit-talk.line: Astram, Nyna already entrusted the Emblem to Prince Marth. Do you understand the meaning of her actions?

recruit-talk.speaker: Astram
recruit-talk.line: Wh-what!! When did this happen, Jeorge? Nyna requested Prince Marth for help?

recruit-talk.speaker: Jeorge
recruit-talk.line: I believe that is the only explanation. Astram, if you want to find out the truth then come with us... If you die here, what will Midia do? You must live on, for her. You must live on, so you can confirm with your eyes what is happening.

recruit-talk.speaker: Astram
recruit-talk.line: Hmm... I guess I have no choice. But, Jeorge. If this war is as Hardin said, and was caused by Prince Marth's ambitions. I will never forgive you! Remember that!!

boss.speaker: Willow
boss.line: Hahaha... It's time for me to show you... The destructive power of my Meteor magic...

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Hello Kris. It's been too long since we last spoke casually in Altea Castle. This place holds a lot of memories for you, doesn't it? Your long days of training... Not to mention you met Katarina here...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: I-I'm sorry. I was in a hurry, and... Excuse me, did you come here to become an Altean knight as well?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: I sense the same enemy presence... as that time. They may already be close...

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Sire! We're under attack! It's the assassins!

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Begin preparations for a counterattack immediately!

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Hello Kris. It's been too long since we last spoke casually in Altea Castle. This place holds a lot of memories for you, doesn't it? Your long days of training... Not to mention you met Katarina here...

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: I-I'm sorry. I was in a hurry, and... Excuse me, did you come here to become an Altean knight as well?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: I sense the same enemy presence... as that time. They may already be close...

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Sire! We're under attack! It's the assassins!

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Begin preparations for a counterattack on the double!
